Explanation: Safely dropping to the ice and getting back up without help.
Walking forward on the ice to gain balance.
Coasting forward with both feet on the ice.
Pushing feet apart and pulling them together (lemon shape).
One forward swizzle followed immediately by one backward swizzle.
Gliding forward while squatting down as low as possible.
Pushing heels out to scrape the ice and stop.
Skating across the width of the ice (moving beyond marching).
Gliding on a single foot (Right and Left).
Wiggling both feet parallel side-to-side to generate momentum.
Moving backward safely.
Doing the "lemon" shape in reverse to move backward.
Rotating 180° on the spot (forward to backward) on two feet.
Proper "push and glide" using the blade edges.
Skating on a circle, pumping the outer leg for speed.
Turning forward-to-backward (and vice versa) while moving on a curve.
Skating backward and holding a glide on two feet.
A "step-together-step" motion on a circle (lifts the inside foot).
Pushing heels out to stop while moving backward.
Gliding on a curve on one foot, leaning to the outside.
Gliding on a curve on one foot, leaning to the inside.
Crossing the outer foot over the inner foot to gain speed on a curve.
Gliding backward on a single foot (Right and Left).
Pumping the outer leg while gliding backward on a circle.
Turning both feet sideways instantly to stop abruptly.
Gliding backward on a curve, leaning to the outside.
Gliding backward on a curve, leaning to the inside.
Crossing feet while moving backward on a curve.
A one-foot turn from Forward Outside edge to Backward Inside edge.
Gliding on edges while swinging the free leg past the skating leg.
Spinning in a circle on two feet.
A one-foot turn from Forward Inside edge to Backward Outside edge.
Changing from an outside edge to an inside edge (or vice versa) on one foot.
Dragging one foot behind the other in a "T" shape to stop.
Gliding on one leg with the other leg dragging behind on the ice.
Spinning on one foot (entering from a two-foot spin).
Stepping from forward to backward (heel-to-heel) to change direction.
A 180° jump taking off forward and landing backward.
A leap over a toe pick to learn jump height.
Gliding on one foot with free leg extended high (arabesque).
A 360° jump taking off from a backward inside edge.
A 360° jump using the toe-pick to vault from a back outside edge.
Spinning on one foot moving backward.
A 360° edge jump taking off from a back outside edge (no toe pick).
A 360° toe-pick jump taking off from a back inside edge.
Spinning on one foot in a squat position.
Spinning with body horizontal in a "T" shape.
A 360° toe-pick jump from a back outside edge (counter-rotated).
Forward takeoff, 1.5 rotations in the air.
Jumping into a camel spin position from the air.
Changing positions (Camel -> Sit) without stopping.
Two full rotations in the air (Back Inside edge).
Two full rotations (Toe Assist).
Two full rotations for the harder jumps.
A turn changing direction against the circle's curve.
Complex turns that change edge but maintain direction (or vice versa).
Traveling multi-rotational turns on one foot.
Pulling the free blade above the head while spinning.
